application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details of installation, operation, and maintenance of odour abatement equipment and extract system pursuant to condition 7 of planning permission ref: 225251VAR dated 06/09/2023 for: Minor material amendment (S.73) to vary condition no.2 and 3 in relation to planning permission reference 215169FUL dated 24/08/2022 for 'Construction of single storey sales building (Mixed Use Class E(a)/Sui Generis); installation of electric vehicle charging hub and associated plant; new jet washes; car care facilities; bin store; car/cycle parking; landscaping and other associated works (following demolition of existing workshop buildings and structures and petrol station sales building, canopy link, jet washes and plant/refuse area)'. Amendment seeks changes to the site layout and alterations to the canopy
